dcterms:description: The MS-COCO dataset was initially designed for object detection and segmentation. Recently, it has also been adopted directly for evaluating multi-label image recognition due to its fine-grained object annotation.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO

dcterms:creator: R. Krishna

D. A. Shamma
dcterms:description: Visual Genome contains 108,249 images with densely annotated objects, attributes, and relationships. It is a good test bed for measuring the performance of the multi-label recognition task and the effect of model calibration.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome
